Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery wine-jar, the fabric contains a number of white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393405) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393405)
